1.title: Chucky's Revenge

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

1.plot: Richard Rawlings with crew from the Gas Monkey Garage and cast from "Street Outlaws" check out a record breaking motorcycle crash, helmet cam footage, & a shocking montage as they watch some of the most craziest stunts ever caught on camera.

2.title: Gas Monkey Grillers

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

2.plot: Richard Rawlings with friends from the Gas Monkey Garage & "Street Outlaws" cast take a look online at how far adrenaline junkies will go for thrill. Clips cover it all with plane, bus, motorcycle, & race car crashes.

3.title: The Return of Farmtruck and AZN

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

3.plot: Richard, Christie, and friends Farmtruck and AZN from Street Outlaws explore the craziest of viral videos. When a teen experiments with heat and a glow stick the situation turns explosive; a bird terrorizes a bike rider; a selfie-stick video goes wrong.

4.title: Funny Farmtruck & AZN

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

4.plot: Richard and Christie along with Farmtruck and AZN from the show Street Outlaws view the craziest of crazy caught on camera! A firework sends a 4,400-pound manhole cover flying through the air toward a man's face; a bystander gets caught inside a tornado.

5.title: Outlaws Rock, Monkey's Roll

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

5.plot: The Gas Monkey Garage welcomes Street Outlaws Farmtruck and AZN to showcase helmet cam crashes, a Ferrari mishap video and a rogue tire montage.

1.title: Fire, Fails & Faceplants

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

1.plot: Richard and Aaron kick back and watch the funniest, most spectacular clips from around the world. They'll see how parking lots can be funny and scary, see a stuntwoman do a spectacular faceplant, watch a desperate man in search of an erotic toy, and more.

2.title: Cars, Concrete & Crashes

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

2.plot: Richard & Aaron share the wildest clips as they watch the threat of a new danger...car tires! See a couple battle a jet airplane and a guy totally lose his mind, on his own car. And wait until you catch some pals blowing their friend up with a car airbag!

3.title: Motorcycle Monkey Mayhem

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

3.plot: Richard and Aaron check out some of the craziest viral videos. Witness a motorcycle accident that leaves the driver with a tree branch impaled! Watch a wheelie crash leading to massive road rash. And take a look at some incredible dash cam crashes.

4.title: Turkey Day Disasters

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

4.plot: Fails are on the menu for this special Thanksgiving episode of Demolition Theater. Richard, Aaron and the Gas Monkey crew witness a Thanksgiving prank that sends a family's dinner flying. And, in tonight's montage, it's attack of the Turkey!

5.title: Party on Wreck Street

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

5.plot: Richard, Aaron, and the crew of Gas Monkey Garage share some of the craziest viral videos. An exploding whale makes a huge mess, a roof-to-truck jumper hits the ground instead, and a driver walks away unharmed from one of the most gnarly race car crashes.

6.title: Catastrophic Failure

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

6.plot: Richard and Aaron are joined by the king of nutshots and a couple of stock car hot shots. Also, a world record attempt sends one car into a dangerous nosedive, a biker flips into a bulldozer, and a motorcycle accident sends a rider flying 80 feet.

7.title: Happy, Hospital Holidays

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

7.plot: It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas at Gas Monkey Garage. Richard is joined in studio by his friends from "Street Outlaws" as they celebrate the season with a Christmas list of the craziest videos. Tom Smith from Misfits Garage also stops by.

8.title: Outlaws All Over

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Appetite for Destruction

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

9.plot: Richard, Aaron and their friends from Gas Monkey Garage view viral videos as cars crash, heads bash, and trains smash! Flames are flying as fireworks explode and a fire department training exercise goes wrong. Also, A drone hits a groom in the face.

10.title: Misfit in the Making

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

10.plot: Richard and ex-employee/star of Misfit Garage, Tom Smith are on the hunt for the best viral videos. A motorcycle driver is caught in a flash flood. Also, a cyclist crashes at 107 miles per hour. And a senior stops a robbery in progress with purse power.

11.title: Outlaw Overdrive

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

11.plot: Big Chief and Chuck from the hit show Street Outlaws join Richard in-studio to critique the best viral videos from around the world. A car crashes through a convenience store, a train crashes through a truck, and a motorcycle crashes all by itself.

1.title: The Outlaw Way

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

1.plot: Richard and friends Big Chief and Chuck from the show Street Outlaws check out some of the craziest fails caught on tape. A Russian man steals a police car and goes for the ride of his life. Also, A fire department demonstration leads to a real disaster.

2.title: Throwing a Mis-Fit

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

2.plot: Richard welcomes his ex-employee of Misfit Garage, Tom Smith back to Gas Monkey Garage as they check out a new collection of the craziest viral videos. A weightlifter grunts, growns and spews. A strippers pole dance is a smashing success and more...

3.title: Sudden Impact

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

3.plot: Richard, Aaron and the Gas Monkey gang are joined by a crazy Canadian on a lawnmower who jumps a fridge but fails to clear the clothes dryer stacked on top. And, find out what happens when police cars are attacked by dogs, criminals, and a chimpanzee!

4.title: I Fought the Outlaw

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

4.plot: Richard, Christie, and friends Farmtruck and Azn from the show Street Outlaws check out some the most incredible viral videos. A drone hits a groom in the face. A raging doctor drives through a car dealership. And friends light fireworks in a bathtub.

5.title: Above the Outlaw

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

5.plot: Richard and Christie welcome their friends Farmtruck and Azn from Street Outlaws to check out the most insane moments caught on camera! A drift trike slams into an SUV, a blizzard turns a street into a skating rink, and a reporter becomes the news story.

6.title: The Monkey Mashup

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

6.plot: Richard Rawlings with Gas Monkey's Christie Brimberry and Mike Coy bring you the craziest clips. A backyard stunt artist goes through a wall of fire. It's the worst day ever for unicyclist on a spiked fence and a bull turns his trainer into a rag doll.

7.title: Mishmash of Monkey Madness

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

7.plot: Richard Rawlings hosts with Gas Monkey's Christie Brimberry and Mike Coy to bring the best of the baddest. We go on a drag race with Richard behind the wheel. Also, a mountain biker takes us on a 1400-foot journey and racing boat turns into a submarine.

8.title: We Like to Monkey Around

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

8.plot: Richard, along with Gas Monkey's own, Christie and Charles take the couch for a wild ride through "crazy clip land." Two brothers are on set to straighten things out over a wrecked racecar. Also, a construction foreman is recused on camera.

9.title: Funky Monkey Fireworks

episode of.title: Fast N' Loud: Demolition Theater (TV Series 2014–2018)

9.plot: Richard and Gas Monkey's Christie and Charles host a cavalcade of clips."Batman" steps us through his take down of a dump thief. A weightlifter drops 305 pounds of barbell on his chest and lives to talk about it. And, fireworks destroy an entire market.
